verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees זְכוֹר־ <S%H2142><s%> remember יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֵ֝ת <S%H854><s%> behalf כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֻנּוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6031><s%> [and] all his afflictions

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> How נִ֭שְׁבַּע <S%H7650><s%> How he sware לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD נָ֝דַ֗ר <S%H5087><s%> [and] vowed לַאֲבִ֥יר <S%H46><s%> unto the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> [God] of Jacob

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Surely אָ֭בֹא <S%H935><s%> Surely I will not come בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle בֵּיתִ֑י <S%H1004><s%> of my house אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Nor אֶ֝עֱלֶ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> nor go up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֶ֥רֶשׂ <S%H6210><s%> bed יְצוּעָֽי׃ <S%H3326><s%> bed

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> I will not אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> I will not give שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8153><s%> sleep לְעֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> to mine eyes לְֽעַפְעַפַּ֥י <S%H6079><s%> to mine eyelids תְּנוּמָֽה׃ <S%H8572><s%> [or] slumber

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until אֶמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> Until I find out מָ֭קוֹם <S%H4725><s%> a place לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD מִ֝שְׁכָּנ֗וֹת <S%H4908><s%> an habitation לַאֲבִ֥יר <S%H46><s%> for the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> [God] of Jacob

הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold שְׁמַֽעֲנ֥וּהָ <S%H8085><s%> Lo we heard בְאֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H672><s%> of it at Ephratah מְ֝צָאנ֗וּהָ <S%H4672><s%> we found בִּשְׂדֵי־ <S%H7704><s%> it in the fields יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> of the wood

נָב֥וֹאָה <S%H935><s%> We will go לְמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֑יו <S%H4908><s%> into his tabernacles נִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה <S%H7812><s%> we will worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <S%H1916><s%> stool רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure

קוּמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD לִמְנוּחָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4496><s%> into thy rest אַ֝תָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> You וַאֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> thou and the ark עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5797><s%> of thy strength

כֹּהֲנֶ֥יךָ <S%H3548><s%> Let thy priests יִלְבְּשׁוּ־ <S%H3847><s%> be clothed צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> with righteousness וַחֲסִידֶ֥יךָ <S%H2623><s%> and let thy saints יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> shout for joy

בַּ֭עֲבוּר <S%H5668><s%> the sake דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David's עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> For thy servant אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּ֝שֵׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> sake turn not away פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4899><s%> of thine anointed

נִשְׁבַּֽע־ <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְדָוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אֱמֶת֮ <S%H571><s%> [in] truth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> He will not יָשׁ֪וּב <S%H7725><s%> he will not turn מִ֫מֶּ֥נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at מִפְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> from it Of the fruit בִטְנְךָ֑ <S%H990><s%> of thy body אָ֝שִׁ֗ית <S%H7896><s%> will I set לְכִסֵּא־ <S%H3678><s%> upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִשְׁמְר֬וּ <S%H8104><s%> will keep בָנֶ֨יךָ ׀ <S%H1121><s%> If thy children בְּרִיתִי֮ <S%H1285><s%> my covenant וְעֵדֹתִ֥י <S%H5713><s%> and my testimony ז֗וֹ <S%H2090><s%> I אֲלַ֫מְּדֵ֥ם <S%H3925><s%> I shall teach גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1121><s%> them their children עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> for evermore עַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> forever יֵ֝שְׁב֗וּ <S%H3427><s%> shall also sit לְכִסֵּא־ <S%H3678><s%> upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion אִ֝וָּ֗הּ <S%H183><s%> he hath desired לְמוֹשָׁ֥ב <S%H4186><s%> [it] for his habitation לֽוֹ׃

זֹאת־ <S%H2063><s%> likewise מְנוּחָתִ֥י <S%H4496><s%> This [is] my rest עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> for ever עַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> forever פֹּֽה־ <S%H6311><s%> Here אֵ֝שֵׁ֗ב <S%H3427><s%> here will I dwell כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִוִּתִֽיהָ׃ <S%H183><s%> for I have desired

צֵ֭ידָהּ <S%H6718><s%> her provision בָּרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> I will abundantly אֲבָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H1288><s%> bless אֶ֝בְיוֹנֶ֗יהָ <S%H34><s%> her poor אַשְׂבִּ֥יעַֽ <S%H7646><s%> I will satisfy לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> with bread

וְֽ֭כֹהֲנֶיהָ <S%H3548><s%> her priests אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> I will also clothe יֶ֑שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> with salvation וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יהָ <S%H2623><s%> and her saints רַנֵּ֥ן <S%H7442><s%> shall shout aloud יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> aloud

שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> There אַצְמִ֣יחַ <S%H6779><s%> to bud קֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> the horn לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David עָרַ֥כְתִּי <S%H6186><s%> I have ordained נֵ֝֗ר <S%H5216><s%> a lamp לִמְשִׁיחִֽי׃ <S%H4899><s%> for mine anointed

א֭וֹיְבָיו <S%H341><s%> His enemies אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> will I clothe בֹּ֑שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> with shame וְ֝עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and יָצִ֥יץ <S%H6692><s%> flourish נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5145><s%> but upon himself shall his crown
